title: 770. Breaking Down Divisional Round Games + Tom Brady & Aaron Rodgers' Future
itunes:title: 770. Breaking Down Divisional Round Games + Tom Brady & Aaron Rodgers' Future
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis look back at all the action from the Divisional Round. The guys start by breaking down the AFC games from the weekend with the Bills vs. Chiefs and Bengals vs. Titans, while also doing a quick look ahead to the AFC Championship Game. Then, the trio analyze the NFC games from the weekend with the Rams vs. Buccaneers and 49ers vs. Packers, with a discussion on the upcoming NFC Championship Game. After that, the guys touch on the reaction from social media to DJ's Mock Draft 1.0 and assess quarterback Tom Brady's uncertain future. Then, the trio hit on the Packers style of play and quarterback Aaron Rodgers' future. Next, the guys discuss new Giants general manager Joe Schoen's to-do list. To wrap up the show, the trio emphasize the importance of special teams in the playoffs.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
